text:
**OpenAI API** - the [Sharing & Publication policy](https://openai.com/api/policies/sharing-publication/) outlines how users may share and publish content generated through their use of the API.  
  
**DALL·E** - see the [Content policy](https://labs.openai.com/policies/content-policy) for details on what images can be created and shared.
title: What are OpenAI's policies regarding sharing and publication of generated content?
